title: Enhanced Idea-to-Concept Protocol Workflow
author: Engineer (apnex)
description: Refine IDEA_V1 to enforce a gated incubation loop that outputs a detailed Markdown Concept, clearly distinguishing it from a GSD Feature implementation.

components.name: Concept Markdown
components.concept: Transition registry/concepts from JSON to Markdown to support rich design documentation.

components.name: Gated Incubation
components.concept: Enforce a Director-guided loop in IDEA_V1 state 2_INCUBATE.

components.name: Clear Taxonomy
components.concept: Codify the distinction: Idea (Spark) -> Concept (Design) -> Feature (Implementation).
